snippet.title: Every Warrior has their trusty Mount | Dev Diaries | Scars of Honor
snippet.description:
Download the BeastBurst App 👇
🍎 Apple App Store - https://beast.ly/7fZCVjQ
🤖 Google Play Store - https://beast.ly/Nnz53Bu

👕 The Beast Burst Merch Shop - https://beast.ly/OcdIiKU

You still have a chance to win an Acer Nitro 5 Gaming Laptop, a SteelSeries Gaming Keyboard, or SteelSeries Gaming Mouse from our biggest Giveaway yet!
To join the Giveaway follow this link: https://gleam.io/Dnvxs/scars-of-honor-giveaway

Scars of Honor, the upcoming, brand-new, free-to-play, no pay-to-win MMORPG.
Join the development and work side-by-side with the developers, to create the best possible game!
100% community-driven development now is the time to make your wishes come true!

Join us now: https://www.scarsofhonor.com/landing/start

■ Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ScarsOfHonor.Official
■ Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/scars.of.honor/
■ Twitter: https://twitter.com/scars_of_honor/
■ Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/ScarsofHonor/
■ Discord: https://discord.gg/8QqTndQbuG

Chapters:
0:00 - Intro
0:25 - Emre's Introduction
1:27 - Game Designer Role
3:32 - What Is A Mount?
3:50 - Mount Brainstorms
4:23 - Capabilities
5:22 - Mount Designs
5:51 - Mounts And Races
6:17 - Breeding In Scars Of Honor
6:46 - Parting Words
7:26 - Outro
